GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, by default sorted according to 'created_at' in descending order

sort_by.description: sorts the array according to the given column name, by default in ASCENDING order

order.description: specifies the ordering of articles - ascending or descending - must be provided as 'asc' or 'desc'

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article specified by its id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments associated with the specified article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment to the article specified by :article_id and responds with the posted comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increments the vote count on an article by the given amount and responds with a copy of the updated article
